name: Extreme Winter Drive: Snow Oil Tanker Supply Truck
name_original: Extreme Winter Drive: Snow Oil Tanker Supply Truck
description:
Winter survival is hard and oil plays an important part in helping with that. With freezing temperatures & blocked roads, life seems to be all but paused. But some of us need to keep the show running.

People need your help in transporting oil to be used for vehicles and heating. The roads are slippery, the path is treacherous and snowfall is intermittent. Make sure you are extremely careful driving in these dangerous conditions. There are patches of ice posing as thin black sheets of glass but like we said, someone's got to do it and from what it seems; that hero is you!

Enjoy driving and please tell us what would you like to see more in this game.
